HomePage.title: Your bilingual vocabulary, always at your fingertips.
HomePage.description: Duonote is your personal space to store and instantly retrieve phrases and words in two languages. Built by you, it's tailored to what you need to say. Duonote's intuitive two-way search means you find what you're looking for quickly and easily, making it perfect for practical lookups on the go.

features.bilingualDesc: Duonote is centered around your unique vocabulary needs. Add the exact phrases, sentences, and terms that are relevant to your conversations and learning style. This isn't a generic dictionary; it's a personalized collection, built by you, for instant practical use.
features.offlineDesc: Study anywhere, anytime - even without internet connection
features.smart: Find words and phrases in a flash
features.smartDesc: Forget which language the phrase was in, or how to spell it perfectly? Duonote's powerful two-way search understands. Type what you remember—in either language—and our intuitive search will quickly find your saved notes, making lookups effortless even with typos or partial entries.
